subject: Re: [junit] what is the purpose of TestDecorator
msgSnippet: ... Look for examples of TestSetup, which is a TestDecorator. You can find examples on the web or in the many good JUnit books. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
messageBody:
venkata srihari wrote:
> Hello All,
>
> Tomorrow i have a presentation to give on JUnit. So kindly help me with
> some doubts.
>
> i need a description on how to use TestDecorator
> (junit.extensions.TestDecorator) and where we exactly use it. Give me a
> simple example if possible.
>
> i appreciate ur time ...

Look for examples of TestSetup, which is a TestDecorator. You can find
examples on the web or in the many good JUnit books.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
